title: Cookie Policy - 4Generate
description: 4Generate platform cookie policy. Learn how we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.
keywords: cookie policy, cookies, technologies, tracking, navigation, 4generate

sections.title: 1. What are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to recognize your device and remember information about your visit, such as your language preferences and other settings.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content:
We use cookies to:

• Remember your language preferences
• Improve site performance
• Analyze how you use our platform
• Personalize content and ads
• Ensure site security
• Facilitate navigation between pages

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content:
We use different types of cookies:

• Essential Cookies: Necessary for basic site functionality
• Performance Cookies: Collect information about how you use the site
• Functionality Cookies: Remember your choices and preferences
• Marketing Cookies: Used to personalize ads and content
• Third-Party Cookies: From external services we use

sections.title: 4. Specific Cookies Used
sections.content:
List of main cookies we use:

• _locale: Stores your language preference
• _theme: Remembers your preferred theme (light/dark)
• _analytics: Collects anonymous usage data
• _session: Keeps your session active
• _preferences: Saves your custom settings

sections.title: 5. Cookie Duration
sections.content:
Our cookies have different durations:

• Session Cookies: Expire when you close the browser
• Persistent Cookies: Remain for a determined period
• Long-term Cookies: Can last up to 2 years
• Short-term Cookies: Expire in 24 hours or less

sections.title: 6. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content:
Some cookies are set by third-party services we use:

• Google Analytics: For traffic analysis
• Cloudflare: For security and performance
• Social Networks: For sharing buttons
• Analytics Services: For usage metrics

These services have their own cookie policies.

sections.title: 7. How to Manage Cookies
sections.content:
You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

• Browser settings: Block or allow cookies
• Privacy tools: Manage preferences
• Incognito mode: Browse without persistent cookies
• Privacy extensions: Block tracking cookies
• Site settings: Adjust specific preferences

sections.title: 8. Impact of Disabling Cookies
sections.content:
If you disable cookies, some functionality may be affected:

• Your preferences won't be remembered
• The site may not work properly
• Usage analytics will be limited
• Personalization will be reduced
• Some tools may not function

sections.title: 9. Cookies and Personal Data
sections.content:
Most of our cookies do not collect personally identifiable data:

• Data is anonymized when possible
• Personal information is protected
• Essential cookies don't require consent
• Optional cookies can be refused
• You have full control over your data

sections.title: 10. Updates to this Policy
sections.content:
This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically:

• We will notify about significant changes
• Notices will be displayed on the site
• Registered users will receive emails
• Update date will always be indicated

Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.
